8d044a29-d704-4f28-b86b-6b8990f08076.description: The earner of this badge has achieved the Advanced Practitioner level of registration on The Federation for Informatics Professionals in Health and Care professional register. The earner has been assessed against the FEDIP professional standards for health and care informatics practitioners and has provided evidence to support a level of competence, knowledge and experience in the field of health informatics that has been awarded the registration level of Advanced Practitioner.
8d044a29-d704-4f28-b86b-6b8990f08076.name: Advanced Practitioner FEDIP

issuer.summary: issued by The Federation for Informatics Professionals

alignments.name: The Professional Standards in Health informatics
alignments.description: Through discussions with leading professional bodies, FEDIP brings individuals & organisations together and has established professional standards in health informatics to maintain a public register of experienced practitioners, which offers greater confidence to employers, clients, colleagues, government & the wider society, both UK and overseas.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has evidenced that they exercise autonomy within broad but well-defined parameters.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they build appropriate and effective business relationships.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they perform a range of complex technical/professional work and applies fundamental principles in meeting work requirements.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they advise on available standards, methods, tools and applications relevant to their own specialism, making appropriate choices from alternatives.
The earner of this badge is a member of one of FEDIP's professional membership bodies and has committed to performing a minimum of 10 CPD hours a year in order to maintain their practitioner status.

38153536-3962-4df3-96a3-10cf909faeb7.description: The earner of this badge has achieved the Leading Practitioner level of registration on The Federation for Informatics Professionals in Health and Care professional register. The earner has been assessed against the FEDIP professional standards for health and care informatics practitioners and has provided evidence to support a level of competence, knowledge and experience in the field of health informatics that has been awarded the highest registration level of Leading Practitioner.
38153536-3962-4df3-96a3-10cf909faeb7.name: Leading Practitioner FEDIP

issuer.summary: issued by The Federation for Informatics Professionals

alignments.name: The Professional Standards in Health informatics
alignments.description: Through discussions with leading professional bodies, FEDIP brings individuals & organisations together and has established professional standards in health informatics to maintain a public register of experienced practitioners, which offers greater confidence to employers, clients, colleagues, government & the wider society, both UK and overseas.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has evidenced that they exercise autonomy within broad parameters and that they have authority over all aspects of a significant area of work.

The earner of this badge has evidenced that they inform the formulation and application of policy and strategy and address complex, nonroutine organisational problems. The practitioner can determine, agree and authorise the acquisition of resources necessary to enable effective and efficient task resolution and/or service delivery, with due regard to safety, security and quality.

The earner of this badge has evidenced that they have a full range of strategic leadership and management skills. The practitioner has initiated and led organisational programs of work, assigning project management and monitoring to ensure outcomes are reliable and effective and to the appropriate codes of practice.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they have an in-depth understanding of the industry and implications of emerging technologies on the wider business environment.
The earner of this badge is a member of one of FEDIP's professional membership bodies and has committed to performing a minimum of 10 CPD hours a year in order to maintain their practitioner status.

skills.name: Ability To Recognise And Develop One's Own Leadership Style

591a6a24-c628-4abc-904e-b93c041bab13.description: The earner of this badge has achieved the Associate Practitioner level of registration on The Federation for Informatics Professionals in Health and Care professional register. The earner has been assessed against the FEDIP professional standards for health and care informatics practitioners and has provided evidence to support a level of competence, knowledge and experience in the field of health informatics that has been awarded the registration level of Associate Practitioner.
591a6a24-c628-4abc-904e-b93c041bab13.name: Associate Practitioner FEDIP

issuer.summary: issued by The Federation for Informatics Professionals

alignments.name: The Professional Standards in Health informatics
alignments.description: Through discussions with leading professional bodies, FEDIP brings individuals & organisations together and has established professional standards in health informatics to maintain a public register of experienced practitioners, which offers greater confidence to employers, clients, colleagues, government & the wider society, both UK and overseas.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has evidenced that they undertake Health and Care Informatics tasks relevant to specialism employing appropriate techniques, methods and procedures as directed.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they apply appropriate methods as instructed when supporting identifying and addressing routine problems.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they use resources to complete tasks or deliver services efficiently and effectively with due regard to safety, security and quality.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they work reliably and effectively under supervision, to the appropriate codes of practice. They accept responsibility for their own work.
The earner of this badge is a member of one of FEDIP's professional membership bodies and has committed to performing a minimum of 10 CPD hours a year in order to maintain their practitioner status.

bfa603d5-0f8e-49c0-a30e-1e3f89e0b307.description: The earner of this badge has achieved the Senior Practitioner level of registration on The Federation for Informatics Professionals in Health and Care professional register. The earner has been assessed against the FEDIP professional standards for health and care informatics practitioners and has provided evidence to support a level of competence, knowledge and experience in the field of health informatics that has been awarded the registration level of Senior Practitioner.
bfa603d5-0f8e-49c0-a30e-1e3f89e0b307.name: Senior Practitioner FEDIP

issuer.summary: issued by The Federation for Informatics Professionals

alignments.name: The Professional Standards in Health informatics
alignments.description: Through discussions with leading professional bodies, FEDIP brings individuals & organisations together and has established professional standards in health informatics to maintain a public register of experienced practitioners, which offers greater confidence to employers, clients, colleagues, government & the wider society, both UK and overseas.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has evidenced that they exercise autonomy within limited parameters and that they may have responsibility for the work of others. They work reliably and effectively without supervision, where appropriate supervising the work of others, to the appropriate codes of practice.

The earner of this badge has evidenced that they perform a range of work, often complex non-routine technical/professional activities and that they can identify, select and use appropriate standards, methods, tools and applications.

The earner of this badge is a member of one of FEDIP's professional membership bodies and has committed to performing a minimum of 10 CPD hours a year in order to maintain their practitioner status and improve competence in their own area of practice.

d5092795-62f2-4fb0-be01-e8f8b9135b42.description: The earner of this badge has achieved the Practitioner level of registration on The Federation for Informatics Professionals in Health and Care professional register. The earner has been assessed against the FEDIP professional standards for health and care informatics practitioners and has provided evidence to support a level of competence, knowledge and experience in the field of health informatics that has been awarded the registration level of Practitioner.
d5092795-62f2-4fb0-be01-e8f8b9135b42.name: Practitioner FEDIP

issuer.summary: issued by The Federation for Informatics Professionals

alignments.name: The Professional Standards in Health informatics
alignments.description: Through discussions with leading professional bodies, FEDIP brings individuals & organisations together and has established professional standards in health informatics to maintain a public register of experienced practitioners, which offers greater confidence to employers, clients, colleagues, government & the wider society, both UK and overseas.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has evidenced that they exercise autonomy subject to overall guidance and direction.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they perform a range of work, sometimes complex and non-routine.
The earner of this badge has evidenced that they select and use relevant methods and procedures. Additionally, the practitioner demonstrates an analytical and systematic approach to issue resolution.
The earner of this badge is a member of one of FEDIP's professional membership bodies and has committed to performing a minimum of 10 CPD hours a year in order to maintain their practitioner status.
